TITLE: Forum Participation
DEF: Active, shared contributions to a discussion board
TASK: The Forum Participation pattern supports engagement in online discussions and collaboration with peers. It aims to stimulate critical thinking, facilitate knowledge sharing, and foster a sense of community. Obstacles can arise from low engagement, superficial contributions, and inappropriate behavior. To make this pattern effective, it is crucial to establish clear guidelines, consistently monitor activity, and provide swift and supportive feedback.
